name: Apple
desc: It's an apple.

name: Orange
desc: It's an orange.

name: Locker
desc: It probably holds some neat stuff!

name: Keypad
desc: A simple 4-digit PIN keypad.

name: Portable Oxygen Tank
desc: Useful for resupplying spacesuits and medical equipment.

name: Oxygenator
desc: A powerful Oxygen generator. Capable of servicing the oxygen needs for over three hundred people!

name: Blue Keycard Reader
desc: You probably need a blue-coloured keycard.

name: Red Keycard Reader
desc: You probably need a red-coloured keycard.

name: Red Keycard
desc: Used to access rooms and containers secured by a red-coloured reader.

name: Green Keycard Reader
desc: You probably need a green-coloured keycard.
Used to access rooms and containers secured by a green-coloured reader.

name: Airlock Panel
desc: It controls the airlock.

name: Admiral's Log
desc: It is dated for three hours ago.

name: Wrench
desc: Standard-issue engineering wrench. Useful for tightening (or loosening) stubborn bolts.

name: Magazine
desc: A copy of Engineering Monthly, Issue #211. This month's articles include pointers on maintaining starliner engines, tips on how to impress non-Engineering colleagues without boring them, and 34 hacks on how to hack hack hackers hacking hackable hacksaws. Fascinating stuff.

name: Hull Debris
desc: A large chunk of the ship's hull. It probably shouldn't be there.

name: Twisted Metal
desc: A huge twisted steel girder. While the flames didn't melt it, it appears that non-uniform thermally-induced stress upon the girder created a concentrated axial compressive load causing sudden structural deformation resulting in a loss of structural stability in the whole room, or something. You're not an engineer.

name: Melted Wiring
desc: A bunch of plenum wiring that has melted and clumped together. Useless to all but the most desperate of scrapper.

name: Molten Slag
desc: Ouch! This stuff is still red hot!

name: MACGFN Control Panel
desc: This panel controls all of MAC-GFN's primary functionality. It has an insert slot for an AI Matrix.
